review: When I used for a urinary tract infection it almost burnt my penis  the sheath and and I had some swelling on the parts of my body even  the tongue was swollen I couldn’t eat some thing which was hot

Took Doxycycline the last time I had UTI(Male) and it didn't work.  Thought I would give it another try and it didn't work this time. I am going to call the doctor and tell him to give me another  antibiotic. A lot of people said this drug was great. Everybody's system is different,  what works for one person may not work for another.

I took as prescribed, and about two days in I noted nausea, and my heart beating so hard/fast. Because of the heavy nausea, eating has become a struggle, and I already stopped taking it over 24 hours ago. Also, I have Acid Reflux I take medication for, and the Doxycycline Mono (100mgs) has aggravated my stomach and lower esophagus to the point where I feel they are on a low constant simmer; not good when Acid Reflux can cause cancer. I personally will never take it again; the side effects were horrendous for the short period of time (7 days twice daily for me) I was supposed to take it, and not being able to eat is never good. I honestly cannot say if it helped in any way because of how absolutely rotten it has made me feel.

At 47 I started having to get up every night while sleeping to pee and was told by pcp that I was just getting older.  Then I  was prescribed Doxycycline 2 1/2 years later for bronchitis  and almost immediately the nightly ritual of peeing 1 or 2 times has stopped completely and getting full nights of sleep once again......

Scariest experience in my life and I've been septic twice before so that says a lot! After finishing a week of doxy I had trouble with wheezing, then diarrhea, then massive attacks of high blood pressure and heart rate. Felt like a heroin overdose...two trips to ER with zero help. Day 10 of bad reaction, I’m still scared to be home alone with my kids. Allergist thinks it was a drug induced Vaso-vagal response....BEWARE!!!!! NEVER again!

The two side effects that always got me while taking doxy were the feeling of nausea and having diarrhea shortly after taking the medicine. For the nausea, I would just eat and it would pretty much immediately go away. Anyways...I did a 10 day course because I noticed burning in my urethra while peeing and the need to go to the restroom very often, and after about the 3rd or 4th day, the burning was gone but it took until about the 7th or 8th day for the urgency to pee to go away. I’m an adult male 6’1, 230lbish, and I took a 100mg dose twice a day, usually 12 hours apart. Hope this helps!
I read the reviews on this particular drug and was very worried about it making me sicker than I was.  After 1 day I was so much better!!  No side effects and I am so pleased.

Can I just say if you experience a reaction to doxycycline you do not continue taking a medication you speak to your GP. All drugs have side effects these negative comments might dissuade someone from taking this medication. In 9/10 people it is perfectly safe.

I took a two week course of doxycycline because I had pain in my testicles, the doctor assumed it was a uti or kidney infection. Within a couple days of taking the drug I noticed I was having some serious mood swings (would only notice upon reflection of what I had said to people)Then came extreme sun sensitivity (ended up with pretty bad sun burn and eczema, mostly on my fingers and hands) and fairly regular tingling in my hands and joint pain in my knees and elbows, I also have serious sensitivity and pain in my fingertips (especially if i tried to squeeze something to pick it up).INow about a month and a half after finishing the course  have noticed pain in my joints again and the most strange thing for me in that my thumb nails are falling off and some fingernails connection to my fingers are starting to recede. On the other hand I basically had no problem with testicular pain straight from the first dose of the drug.

I took doxycycline with food and a large glass of water both morning and night. I had no side effects whatsoever- no nausea, vomiting, headache, etc. I felt symptom relief after just 1 day. While I’m sure others may have had different experiences- don’t let that deter you from trying!

Prescribed for urerithitis (an inflammation of the urethra gland).  Medicine generally works well; I did have some issues with my blood pressure increasing (normal for me is about 128/85, the doxycycline caused it to go up to about 145/90, but this appears to be temporary). Don't have any pain in my urethra as of now; still have 7 days left on the medication!

This was my second time on the med. The first time I had no issues at all. Prescribed 100mg twice a day. This time I had nausea, dizziness, severe headaches and worst of all, non-stop panic attacks. I do have anxiety issues but rarely ever have panic attacks so this scared me big time. My doctor pulled me off after Day 3 and said my infection was likely gone since the side effects went away and a week later I have an infection again.

I was given Macrobid first for the presence of strep B in a urine culture.  On the third pill I felt flu like so I stopped. I was then prescribed a single dose Monurol (focfomycin) but the flu symptoms and pain in my back/ kidney area continued.  Then I was given doxycycline.  Things just went down hill.  I thought I was experiencing a kidney infection, a gallbladder problem infection or even hepatitis A!  I experienced a throbbing headache.  All over body flu symptoms, numbness and weakness in hand, pain in ankles, hamstring.  Went to ER; organs fine; blood fine; urine not readable after taking too many antibiotics.  Stopped the drug after this.  I am incapacitated in bed with total weakness, shaking, abdominal pain.  I have to fly tomorrow.  Praying I can make it.  Antibiotics either kill you or the infection.  It’s a gamble every time.
I was having pain In a  gland and also frequently urination.  After taking doxycycline it  cured both.. So happy,  it works

I noticed my urine had a very strong, pungent odor to it, was a little darker than normal, but, no pain or problems urinating.  I googled "why does my urine smell so pungent". The response was possible UTI (Urinary Tract Infection). I purchased AZO urinary tract infection home self testing Test Strips at my local pharmacy and the results were positive. My doctor prescribed Doxycycline Hyclate 100mg. Within 3 days, the color and odor of my urine returned to normal. I continued to take my RX as prescribed for the next 7 days, took another AZO self test, and the results were negative. This drug worked for me; no side effects.

I was prescribed this medicine for UTI. So far (day 3) my UTI pain has gone down a lot. If you’re like me and you research every detail of a medicine before you take it, please listen to me. I have extremely bad anxiety and I’ll think I have tons of symptoms after I take my medicine but it’s just my anxiety. Take a deep breath. Take some probiotics, eat (if it is with food) and then take your antibiotics and you’ll be fine. Get some rest and drink water. This medicine gave me no symptoms. Stop researching! Everyone’s different, just because someone had a bad experience doesn’t mean you do!

Do not take this drug. Two Months after completing 1 week course I have bad head pains, pressure in skull, stinging eyes, liquid coming down my nostrils, severe tinnitus, pains in my side, balance problems. Was ok taking the drug but 3 days after had severe electric shock type pains down my right side and continue to deteriorate on a daily basis. Had MRI scan which was clear. Can't sleep because of the pains, tinnitus. Awaiting blood results and nasal liquid results. Repeat Do Not take this drug

My dose was 100mg every 12 hours for 4 days. Full recovery. Marked changes beginning within 5 hours of first dose. Nervous that readers here are making decisions on self-medication (which is not uncommon in a poorly insured by educated US). This is the oral drug of choice for Borellia (Lyme) infection; a stealth bacteria in the circulatory system;  those that are unknowingly Lyme infected may react quickly and badly to this drug, as it turns loose antigens (from dying Borellia) that suddenly may be dealt with by an already heightened immune system. Review 'Herxheimer' (Herx), which is DIAGNOSTIC for Lyme IMHO. Treatment must continue unabated every 12 hours for at least 3-weeks for late stage patients, and be followed by daily IV- Ceftrioxone for another 5-weeks with consult of a Lyme Literate Physician.

Doxy works very well for me - no matter for what condition - but it makes me feel sick if I take it with dairy. I used to take it with yogurt. I learned to avoid dairy with, +/- 2 hrs before and after the med and I don't have problems anymore. Hope this helps. There is another trick. I have taken Doxy made in Europe and I never had any side effects - even when taken with yogurt. I have no explanation for this.

This is the 4th time taking this in two years and it does make me sick (it's for acne and UTI). Upset stomach etc.. But I can’t really take the other antibiotics they give me hives and fast heart rates. The most disturbing thing I’ve noticed the last 2 times using doxycycline I’ve had breakthrough vaginal bleeding and NO I’m not on birth control and have very regular periods when I’m not taking doxycycline.. It normally takes a while for my period to go back to normal after I take them. Anyone else had this issue?

I love this antibiotic it helps my UTI brilliantly I have suffered with UTI's infections for over 60 yrs yes 60yrs and had every antibiotic going in that time     But remember you must take on a full stomach  if you side effects that affect to your stomach

I had kidney stones and a severe kidney, and UTI infection, I was prescribed this medication in the hospital.  The infections cleared up however I had a horrific reaction of severe burning of my hands and feet!  Do not go in the sun at all while on this medication.  My hands and feet are blistering and peeling badly.  I don't recommend this medication.  Ask your doctor for another antibiotic.

Started taking these at lunch time. By night time, the pain I previously experienced in my urinary tract had subsided a great deal. Had me cured by the end of my treatment. Didn't experience any headaches or stomach problems. Top notch.

Was on this medication for chlamydia and it worked great, was symptom free after only 2 pills (1 day). This medication DID NOT work when I got a UTI, I took 4 pills (2 days) and my symptoms actually got worse!

I battled a nasty UTI for over a month & went through 3 different antibiotics till my doctor finally gave me this one. Makes you terribly sick to your stomach but in the end is completely worth it!! Felt completely back to normal in 2 days!!

Took this medicine for a few days and got horrible reactions. Itchy skin, rashes everywhere, swollen eyes and lips, hands and feet, then my throat felt tight and I had to replace it with levafloxocin. It might be effective but has horrible side effects on me. If you have allergies I would avoid.

I suffer from an eye inflamation disorder, and am on doxy for life, so when i had a UTI recently I just upped the dosage - Thought I would share a few of the more common side effects with you. 1st is Nausea - if you shock your system with it (Doxy is a VERY powerful broad spectrum antibiotic) by taking too much too quickly you are likely to get lightheaded and nauseous about an hour after taking it - symptoms persist for another hour or so, and then goes away - best bet is spread it out but with a lower dose - 50mg 4 x a day is just as effective as 100mg twice a day, but causes MUCH fewer symptoms. Secondly - this WILL destroy your natural gastrointestinal flaura and after 3 days or so you will get looser stools and your gas will be BAD

I went to my ER with severe abdominal pain and found out it was a UTI, Dr prescribed doxycycline 100mg 2x a day and I have only taken two pills, in addition to what I took before I was discharged, the first time I took with food (sausage and mac and cheese) and I was puking and had a headache which I took advil for, second time without food and I still puked. Stopping this med and getting switched asap!!
I recently found out I have a urinary infection, I went to the doctors and they prescribed me this medication and within the first day I could already tell results!!! It was absolutely amazing.

I had a severe urinary tract infection and walking pneumonia and doxycycline saved my life. I had 8 seizures back to  back due to the serious infections and they tried keflex 1st but it did not work. Doxycycline is awesome and I'm alive today because of it!

I was prescribed 100mg/2x a day for 7 days to treat a pelvic pain/UTI. It worked, but a couple of days later the UTI returned. The doctor prescribed a second week of 100mg/2x a day for an additional week, during that week, I experienced fever, chills, severe headache, confusion, major nausea and vomited twice.  I went to Urgent Care tonight, because it feels like a pill has been stuck burning my throat for 3 days.  The Urgent Care doctor acknowledged swollen glands, and raw, bright-red throat, and tested for mono and strep-both tests came back negative.  So now I'm home, still in pain, without any answers, just a large medical bill.  If you must take doxy, be aware of the possible side effects.  I

I have a severe urinary tract infection, which has also affected my left kidney. Although this medicine makes me sick every time I take it, its in my system long enough to keep in there. It is the worst medicine to ever have to take, but I have to say it is probably doing its job! I still have 4 days of it left, wish me luck, but I would recommend this to anyone who has a serious infection. I have been on 3 other medicines before this one, ciprofloxacin included, and none of them even touched it! It's worth the sickness sometimes for a healthier life!

Vibramycin (doxycycline):Prescribed for both my urinary tract infection and sinus infection, at the same time. I am a vegan and am finding a bit difficult to time my dosage (2 a day) around other medicines and meals.  I believe it is causing headaches and nausea.  I have not vomited, but feel as if I could.  In the middle of cycle of prescription- hope I can tolerate the remainder.
Vibramycin (doxycycline):Much more effective than Cipro.

Doryx (doxycycline):Took a ten day dosage for urethritis (similar to UTI) and it did not cure it - though some symptoms went away. My friend also had it, though, and it worked fine for him.  I recently changed to Ciprofloxacin, so hopefully that will have better results.

This medicine helped my severe urinary tract infection after taking one treatment for 10 days. Before taking this medicine I was on cipro and sulfate antibiotics to treat my urinary tract infection, 4 times without success.
I had an infection inside my penis and it worked very well to clear it all up.
